attributes.action: make soldiers meals free or properly subsidised like they were befre pay and you dine
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: before pay and dine for £120 per month a serving military culd have 3 decnt meals a day now it costs at least £8 per day as pay and dine portions are smallsothey buy extras just to fill their plates, they even getcharged for a cup of squash and sauce sachets!
